website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive supplement in a liquid formula that works fast for cats with kidney and bladder problems.
pros: Easy to use, and you can apply the liquid to the cat's food
Supplement is manufactured in the United States
Safe to use with any age of cat
Flavored supplement that most cats will love to take willingly
cons: Supplement must be refrigerated and only lasts about one month after opening it

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try you have nothing to lose
customer_reviews.text: I just received my third bottle. My cat is 15 and he is in renal failure but he's holding on. It has not helped with weight gain. He does not like wet food only dry food so I put it in the syringe that I bought on Amazon that measures teaspoons. The amount given goes according to the cat's weight I fill the syringe and just put it in his mouth and he drinks it. He's not doing great but he's holding his own.
customer_reviews.author: Marylee

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped my cat. Our vet couldn't figure ...
customer_reviews.text: Has really helped my cat. Our vet couldn't figure out why she was urinating in odd placing and had blood in her urine. I did some research and found this formula. We have used it for about 3 months and have not seen any accidents for about 4 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Here's how to make your cat take this medicine!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give the people that are having a hard time giving this medicine to their cats aa idea about how I gave it to mine who is also very picky about taking medicine or eating. I use one of the standard glass droppers with a bulb on the end that comes with other medicines. I rinsed it out, and then filled it full of this medicine. Then I pried open her jaw and drop it in . She wasn't too happy about it, but at least I got it down her throat and it works. Try it. Or else use one of the needleless syringes they sell here on Amazon probably a 30 cc size. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding results!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat now has normal kidney blood test levels, thanks to this product!
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: My kitties want to live!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this awesome product I thought my kitties would have been gone by now and they are not! I'm fighting with them against renal failure and I know your product is aiding in their fight! Again thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Theresa Boyle

customer_reviews.title: I am so grateful for this wonderful
customer_reviews.text: OMG kitty was straining at the potty and noting coming out. I ordered this overnight, and she is OK! I mix it with her food and she cant taste it. I am so grateful for this wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: L. Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the immediate results in my cats weight and health
customer_reviews.text: This product is having an immediate positive effect in my cats health. She is eating much more and gaining weight. For months my cat rarely showed any sign of absorption but now she is eating much more.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Second chance on life
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 yr cat who I was ready to put down. She had multiple health issues and very weak. I even got a new kitten to keep my other cat company when the other one was gone. What a difference! She is getting stronger, gaining weight and her hair is looking much better! My oldest cat lived to be 23. Maybe she'll beat that record. Definitely reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: sooooo happy
customer_reviews.text: my picky cat likes it, I put it on his food once a day, and he eats it, he also eats the Neo can cat food, and the Purina kidney support dry food. he is getting his spirit back and wants too play again. sooooo happy
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my cats food and they do not object to the taste. I am very glad I found this product. My vet just did a urinalysis on my 19 year old cat and he said her kidneys are great. He also said that glucosamine in this product was a good thing. I believe it also makes a difference if you feed canned food only. I also believe that most UTI problems can be managed with wet cat food because there is more water to help flush out the system. This is my opinion but I speak from experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered this immediately after coming back from the vet visit for my cat , she was diagnosed with severe kidney failure and the discussion of euthanasia was talked about not wanting to give up ,I order this, the vet appointment was 5 months ago and she's doing better than ever now this stuff is a Wonder
customer_reviews.author: Jmysray

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: After spending?1400.00 at the Vet and purchasing their brand of urinary tract food that my cats wouldn't touch, I found this. Only one of my boys had the problem but decided to put them both on it.bwe are on our 4th bottle and it will be part of their regimen from now on. My older cat that had the crystal issue is acting like a young cat again, playing and running around with his buddy. It's so good to see him acting young again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. LabergeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cat's health has improved with this
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a last ditch effort to find something that could help my aging cat who has kidney disease and is very underweight. She goes through cycles of throwing up that take some too much out of her each time (no pun intended). Her kidneys can't be healed, but this formula has stabilized her so well. First of all, she likes it (she's a picky eater) and her vomiting cycles have eased to almost nothing at all. It used to be hard to get her to eat, but now her appetite is healthy and I rarely throw out unwanted food. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: My cat was almost dead from Kidney failure. I was giving him fluids under his skin every other day and he hated it. Almost done the first bottle. No more need to give the fluids and he seems to be gaining a little weight. He's not perfect, but he sure is better!
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: This helped my 17 year old cat
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old cat was having seizures and was in early stages of Kidney Disease. We almost lost him , he was not eating and was deteriorating slowly. I was not giving up and started giving him food via syringe and pedialyte which helped but he still wasn’t doing very well so I found this and he has been taking it for 4 days now and every day he is getting more active and alert, he is eating again too! I am so happy this seems to be what he needed . It is worth the try. I give him his daily does with a syringe.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for cats who mess outside litter box
customer_reviews.text: One of our elderly cats has been peeing just outside his box off and on for years. (Hint: use a doggie pee pad just outside the box to catch any messes.) We found out he had kidney issues and now he is on daily medication. With much skepticism we decided to try this product, knowing how finicky our cats can be. To our surprise, the both of our cats take this liquid with no problem. We just add a few drops to their wet food. We noticed a difference within two days! We also notice that when we skip a few days and there is an accident, once we give it to them again it has the same positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: May have helped save my cat's life!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes really well with soft pate cat food. he doesn't drink it with water, but with food he doesn't notice the difference and eats it fine. my cat was not eating right for like 2 weeks, except for a senior cat liquid snack pouch by bisque or something. after i mixed this in his snack thing for a few days, he started eating normally again! Too many variables to know for sure, but it may have helped!
customer_reviews.author: Autodidact

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful product has helped my elderly cat ( who has kidney disease ) tremendously! I've purchased two bottles already. And will continue using this for all my cats as they age. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Meindel

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it in my cats.
customer_reviews.text: I suspect that this is helpful if you can get it in your cat. My cats are not interested. They won't take it straight. They don't want it in their wet food or water. And, it turns their dry food to cement. Don't feel bad. My cats, and I have many, are reluctant to eat ANY additives. So, I'm just giving it up. It's not worth the misery. And cost. Oh, my god the cost. I have poured so much money into these meowers! Mostly for naught.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Really helps my "problem" cats
customer_reviews.text: I pour it directly on their canned food, they don't mind the taste at all and it definitely seems to help. I stopped going to the vet because nothing they did seemed to help much. The cats did not respond to antibiotics and the trouble cat was impossible to give pills to. One cat has no problems at all anymore, the other urinates more frequently but no longer has blood or appears agitated. I have been using the product for many months now.
customer_reviews.author: Evert Boer

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My cat was spraying outside the box, very bad situation. I used this stuff mixed with a little soft food, because by itself she didn't like it. But after a few days she stopped spraying and I finished off the treatment. Highly recommended, it works.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a way to get my senior cat to take glucosamine! I've tried pills with pill pockets and a plethora of chews and she always snubs them. I mix this in with wet food and she eats it right up. Will definitely continue buying this as long as she continues to eat it. I only wish it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine C.

customer_reviews.title: super happy
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy I gave this to all four of my cats including the one with urinary tract issues. I am so happy to report this has giving her life back. So proud of checking this out. Reviews are great. You work amazon. The customers who give reviews rock so good. Thank you guys

But, the chance tuna will hurt him is small compared to his enjoyment of it AND this stuff works. He has no kidney / bladder issues and last month vet said his “tests all look really good” :-)

customer_reviews.title: eh....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen improvement in my cat but that could be because he doesn't like the flavor. I have to add salmon or tuna to it in order for him to ingest it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily the product...
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get my cat to ingest this in any way. Not necessarily the product just the cat.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMonkeyMom

customer_reviews.title: flavor not good for cat
customer_reviews.text: It has a weird flavor - most cats would not like it I don't think (like ours didn't).
customer_reviews.author: Peter Reisen

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to tell if it's any good.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really say. My kitty died 3 days after I gave her some of this.
customer_reviews.author: Karl  Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Cat has showed improvement
customer_reviews.text: She was dying of kidney flavor. She seemed to like the taste. I have been giving her the prescribed dose in her soft food. She has revived. She is much better. Her fur has improved, she pees less. Maybe it is working. I should add that I also give her Omega 3 for humans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Helped with cat urinary problem. Just hard to get them to ingest it!!! I had to use a medicine dropper
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: This really helps my cats
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula! It really helps my cats, especially my 17-year-old with kidney and bladder issues.
customer_reviews.author: CA Smith

customer_reviews.title: Who knows?
customer_reviews.text: Not your fault but my kitty won’t drink it’s, even in her food.
customer_reviews.author: bojo

customer_reviews.title: This works for UTI prevention & arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for almost a year. My cat has been able to jump again (he has horrible arthritis in his back knees) & for the first time in 2 years did not have a UTI. I give him 10ml straight from a syringe & he tolerates it well. Thank you so much,Liquid-Vet, for this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

product_meta.title: Liquid-Vet Cat Kidney and Bladder Formula – Fast Acting Glucosamine and Electrolytes for Kidney and Bladder Aid in Felines – Chicken Flavor – 8 Fluid Ounces 1 pack
product_meta.description: Our fast acting Cat Kidney and Bladder Formula is the only solution with these important ingredients that helps balance kidney potassium levels and protect the urinary tract lining. This formula is exceptional at providing kitties with the fluids and electrolytes they may need due to recent surgeries or sickness. It employs a “pour over” feeding method, allowing you to simply mix it into your cat’s favorite food without having to worry about discarded, crushed up pills. At Liquid-Vet we use only the best human pharmaceutical grade ingredients in our formulas. Plus, not only do we manufacture at our own plant located in the U.S.A., but we source all our materials from U.S.A. based suppliers. For us, quality control is our ultimate priority and we support that claim with a 100% no-questions-asked money back guarantee on all products. Ingredients: Cranberry Extract, Glucosamine Sulfate, D-Mannose, Potassium Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Dextrose, Fructose, Purified Water, Flavor (Chicken, Seafood, or Bacon), & Sodium Chloride
feature_bullets: GLUCOSAMINE AND ELECTROLYTES: Our fast acting Cat Kidney and Bladder Formula is the only solution with these important ingredients that helps balance kidney potassium levels and protect the urinary tract lining. This formula is exceptional at providing kitties with the fluids and electrolytes they may need due to recent surgeries or sickness.

EASIER THAN PILLS: Every cat owner has gone through the rigmarole of trying to get their pet to eat or swallow chews and sprinkles, only to have them crushed up and spit out. Some felines are so keen that they can sniff out medication from a mile away, and refuse to take food with medication altogether. Our joint aid employs a “pour over” feeding method, allowing you to simply mix it into your cat’s favorite food. With a delicious seafood flavor, you won’t have to worry about your cat not effectively taking their medicine.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: To use, first find your cat’s recommended daily oral dose of Liquid-Vet Cat Kidney and Bladder Formula from the table located on the bottle. Then, shake thoroughly and pour the recommended dosage over your cat’s food using the attached dosage cap. For freshness, refrigerate and use within a maximum of 32 days after opening.

ASSURED QUALITY: At Liquid-Vet we use only the best human pharmaceutical grade ingredients in our formulas. Plus, not only do we manufacture at our own plant located in the U.S.A., but we source all our materials from U.S.A. based suppliers. For us, quality control is our ultimate priority and we support that claim with a 100% no-questions-asked money back guarantee on all products.

SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes (1) 8 fl. oz. Chicken Liquid-Vet Cat Kidney and Bladder Formula bottle. Formulated for all cats and kittens. Use caution when giving to pregnant or lactating animals. Safe if ingested by dogs or puppies. For product information or adverse event reporting,
